title: Pound Puppies
resume: Pound Puppies is an American/Canadian animated series that premiered on The Hub Network on October 10, 2010, in the United States. Pound Puppies also aired on YTV in Canada and on Boomerang in the UK and Ireland, as well as Cartoon Network in Saudi Arabia. The series is produced by Hasbro Studios. It is the second series, after the 1986 series, to adapt Pound Puppies into a cartoon format. It is a kid-friendly cartoon, and is designed to appeal to children and their families. It has also featured very well-known voice actors, such as Betty White.
